channel.title: mutsumi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mutsumi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mutsumi lesson
item.description: 21:48 Tuesday 07 April 2015 JST Good lesson with Mutsumi; her English is certainly improving, though she doesn’t see it! We’ve been working on past perfect / past continuous / present continuous. Her husband joined us near the end of the lesson and gave me a cool navy/dark gray/olive camouflage suit jacket! wow! It’s barely too small for me, but definitely wearable!

item.title: Great fun with Bruno et. al.
item.description: ##23:51 Saturday 01 November 2014 JST## Mutsumi invited Lin and I to eat with her and hubby and nephew and friends Bruno and Sachiko at a Taiwanese restaurant near their house. I was enthralled as Lin spoke Mandarin with the proprietor for a bit. So cool! I was inspired to learn Japanese a bit more than before. ブルノさんが９か月勉強してる、ペラペラできた。すごい！
